description: This film is about the work the Forestry Commission is doing by way of land conservation and re-afforestation over their two-and-a-half million acres in Britain. Their interest in preservation of wild life and use of land for recreation is also outlined. Shots of Scotland and the Lake District at various seasons of the year are included.
